::Cerberus/Four Nightmares(=C6ger, Fame, Bellum, Obitus)::

    He smiled a=
t this bot. He knew what his plans were, and this bot was undisciplined, he=
 was unworthy. "I am here to assume command of the Destrons. I was sent her=
e by Magmatron himself."
    He motioned for the Nightmares to move in if t=
his bot decided to attack, or try and stand up. They did. Cerberus transfor=
med to Robot mode. His face was covered by a plate, resembling Prime. He wa=
s still looking organic, as a matter of fact he is Transmetal 2. "I wish to=
 speak to the bot known as Shredder. I have an understanding that he is the=
 leader here, and I will wish to meet the bots under his command."
    He c=
ompletly treated the bot who he is talking to as an underling, someone comp=
letly un worthy. He knew where he wanted to set up the new Destron base, an=
d it wasn't near here.
